about.title: about
description: Hello! I'm Sabuj Mia, a frontend-focused full-stack developer with 1+ years of experience building end-to-end web solutions. I specialize in React, Next.js, and TypeScript, crafting high-performance interfaces with 95+ Lighthouse scores while seamlessly integrating backend APIs and databases like MongoDB Atlas.

My work spans university management systems, job portals with payment gateways, and AI-driven platforms—combining responsive UI design (Tailwind/SASS) with robust functionality (Node.js/Express). Passionate about optimizing user flows in form-heavy apps (LMS, dashboards) and solving problems collaboratively in agile environments.

contacts.title: contacts
contacts.text: I’m always open to new opportunities, collaborations, or just a tech chat. Reach out via email or LinkedIn—I’d love to connect!

description: I’m a self-taught front-end developer based in Warsaw, Poland. I can develop responsive websites from scratch and raise them into modern user-friendly web experiences.
Transforming my creativity and knowledge into a websites has been my passion for over a two years. I have been helping various clients to establish their presence online.
I always strive to learn about the newest technologies and frameworks.

facts.title: fun-facts
list: I like winter more than summer
I often bike with my friends
My favorite movie is The Green Mile
